labels.value: Create a book with valid details

name: Create a book with valid details

steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
User Signup: expected 200, actual 200. User created successfully. Response: {"message":"User created successfully"}

User Login: expected 200, actual 200. Login successful. Response: {"access_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJib29rZmxvd191c2VyXzE3NDkwMTYwMTUzODFAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3NDkwMTc4MjB9.b6MgykG0es4mXcy5tSqbOq3evSWD19gmLvZMmLTXILU","token_type":"bearer"}
Given  a book payload with name "MyBook1", author "Alice", year 2024, and summary "A story begins" is prepared
Prepared book payload: Book{id=21264, name='MyBook1', author='Alice', published_year=2024, book_summary='A story begins', cover_image_url='null'}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation request response: Status: 200, Body: {"book_summary":"A story begins","id":21264,"author":"Alice","published_year":2024,"name":"MyBook1"}
Then  validate book creation response code is 200 and response contains book details
Book Creation: expected 200, actual 200, name: MyBook1
